page.title: 14RELIGION
page.content: {Lye Mosque.} In Lye High Street there is a side turning which leads to{Lye Mosque.}The religion that{Muslims}follow is called {Islam.}Their God is the same as ours but they believe that Jesus was a prophet. They believe that{Mohammed} was the most important prophet. Muslims pray five times a day. Before entering the mosque Muslims have to remove their shoes and socks and do the following ritual; wash hands once, their mouths, noses, ears and arms three times; also wash their faces, hair, necks and feet.This is called{Al-Wushu. When they go to pray the girls must ensure that their legs are covered and that they have a scarf to cover their heads. The boys just wear a hat and their normal clothes.
